acc1.title: How long does the installation process usually take?
acc1.text: Everything depends on the quantity and type of installation, but an average house can be finished in a time interval of 2 to 3 days.

acc2.title: What is the price of the installation service?
acc2.text: You can freely contact us for the price, after a successful agreement we will send our man to your address who will take measurements and give a precise offer.

acc3.title: Do you offer any kind of warranty on your installation?
acc3.text: Our guarantee: 3 years for glass, hardware and functionality of the window. Technical support, service and repairs are available after the warranty period.

acc4.title: Why does condensation occur on the glass of pvc windows?
acc4.text: Due to increased humidity in rooms that are poorly ventilated in winter.

acc5.title: What types of windows and doors do you offer?
acc5.text: For all information about our products, you should open the navigation menu, then choose which product you want to view, and there you will see all the information and types of that product.

acc6.title: What can we expect during the installation process?
acc6.text: On the scheduled day, our team will arrive at your home. They will take care of removing the old windows and doors and install new ones. After the installation is complete, the team will clean up the work area, remove any debris and ensure your home looks like new. Before they leave, our team will give you instructions on how to use and maintain your new windows and doors for long-lasting performance.
